name: Vulcan Consulting Limited
goal:
Vulcan Consulting is a European consultancy firm that offers specialist advice to growing businesses and multinational companies on complex domestic and EU regulation.

We provide unique insights, analysis and advice for companies who deal with the complex and ever changing regulatory environment in the European Union.
interests: Banking and financial services, Competition, Economy, finance and the euro, Foreign affairs and security policy, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health
euInitiatives:
- Financial Services & Banking
- Healthcare
- Security
- Technology
